column3: The second quarter of 2015 Income from Operations includes an $8.9 pre-tax charge or $0.05 per share to terminate an international defined benefit pension plan.
The second quarter of 2014 Income from Operations includes $5.0 of intangible asset impairment charges.
In determining Income before Income Taxes, interest expense, investment earnings, and other income, net, were allocated to the segments based upon each segment's relative Income from Operations.
The second quarter of 2015 Net Income includes a $17.0 or $0.13 per share impairment charge to write-off the remaining investment in Natronx.
